decks.notes: This deck focuses on using sacrifice effects and efficient removal spells to keep control of the board while dealing damage to the opponent. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven and Mayhem Devil, the deck can generate value from sacrificing creatures and dealing damage to the opponent's creatures. Yagra, Eater of All serves as a powerful finisher, offering a way to close out the game quickly once the opponent is low on resources. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control throughout the game to secure a victory.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Arclight Phoenix as a powerful recurring threat alongside a mix of cheap spells to fill the graveyard and trigger its ability. The deck aims to quickly deploy threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Lightning Axe and Spell Pierce. The inclusion of cards like Ledger Shredder and Opt help to dig for key pieces while cards like Treasure Cruise provide card advantage. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and aggressive, aiming to overwhelm the opponent with its burst potential.

The deck revolves around combining the abilities of Greasefang and Parhelion II to create a powerful synergy. The goal is to control the board with removal spells like Thoughseize and Bitter Triumph while generating value through cards like Grisly Salvage and Raffine's Informant. The inclusion of cards like Esika's Chariot and Skysovereign, Consul Flagship provides additional threats and removal options. The mana base is built to support the various colors needed for the deck's spells and to ensure smooth gameplay.

This control deck revolves around the powerful Niv-Mizzet Reborn as its key card, allowing you to dig deep into your deck for answers and threats. Utilizing four Bring to Light to tutor up important spells, the deck also includes a variety of lands and mana fixers to ensure you have the right colors to cast your spells. With a mix of removal, card draw, and threats like Omnath and Valki, the deck aims to control the game until it can establish a winning board state. Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional value by flickering permanents for even more advantage.

This deck focuses on the aggressive strategy of quickly casting spells to bring Arclight Phoenix back from the graveyard and dealing damage to the opponent. The deck includes a mix of cheap spells like Lightning Axe and Fiery Impulse to trigger Arclight Phoenix's ability, along with card draw and filtering options like Opt and Treasure Cruise. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Spell Pierce and Ledger Shredder to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with recurring Arclight Phoenixes and efficient spells.

This Aggro deck focuses on generating high amounts of green devotion to power up cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Nyxthos, Who Endures. The deck includes efficient creatures like Cavalier of Thorns and Old-Growth Troll, along with ramp cards like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic. Storm the Festival helps to dig for key cards while Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner provides additional card draw and ramp. The inclusion of Leyline of the Guildpact helps protect against removal spells, creating a strong and resilient aggressive strategy centered around green devotion.

This Jund aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures to generate value and deal damage to the opponent. It includes cards like Cauldron Familiar and Mayhem Devil to create a loop of sacrificing and dealing damage, along with Witch's Oven to enable this combo. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push to control the board and Claim the Firstborn to steal opponent's creatures. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures, sacrifice synergies, and removal spells to dominate the battlefield and win the game.

This UW Control deck focuses on maintaining control of the game through card advantage and removal spells. The deck utilizes a combination of counter spells like Dovin's Veto and board wipes like Supreme Verdict to keep the opponent's threats in check. With the help of planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and versatile cards like Shark Typhoon, the deck aims to outvalue opponents with powerful card advantage engines like Memory Deluge and Omen of the Sea. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for extra value by blinking permanents to generate even more advantage.

The deck focuses on using counterspells, removal, and card advantage to control the game and outvalue the opponent. It also includes a companion to provide additional value and support. Key cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Narset, Parter of Veils help the deck generate card advantage and slow down the opponent's game plan. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the control elements of the deck, with a mix of utility lands and dual lands to ensure consistent mana production. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through attrition.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively build up devotion to green through cards like Cavalier of Thorns, Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner, and Leyline of the Guildpact. By ramping up with cards like Elvish Mystic and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful green creatures like Old-Growth Troll and Ulvenwald Oddity. Storm the Festival and Invasion of Ixalan provide additional card advantage and creature selection. The deck's strategy revolves around quickly establishing a strong board presence and pressuring the opponent into submission.

This control deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Escape to the Wilds and Omnath, Locus of Creation, while also utilizing a variety of spells and creatures to control the board and outvalue opponents. The key strategy is to quickly ramp up mana to play powerful threats like Zacama, Primal Calamity and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Portable Hole and Leyline Binding. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of ramp, control, and powerful threats.
